Peaky Blinders movie release date on Netflix: Is it releasing this year?

Peaky Blinders movie on Netflix has been confirmed by makers and now all eyes are on the release date.

05 Jun, 2024, 05:01 PM IST

The Night Manager Season 2: See who joins cast and other updates about filming and production team

Camila Morrone joins Tom Hiddleston in “The Night Manager” Season 2. The new season starts filming later this year, continuing the story eight years after Season 1. Elizabeth Debicki will not return.

30 May, 2024, 01:09 AM IST

This City Is Ours: Here’s what you need to know about Sean Bean starrer BBC drama series

Sean Bean stars as a gang leader in the BBC drama ‘This City Is Ours.’ The series, set in Liverpool, features a stellar cast and follows complex relationships within a disintegrating gang.

29 May, 2024, 01:33 AM IST

'Blue Lights' Season 2: Release date, trailer, where to watch and more

'Blue Lights' Season 2 follows the rookie officers of the PSNI, who were shocked to know about the death of PC Gerry Cliff at the end of Blue Lights Season 1. Gerry had a great influence on Constable Tommy Foster and following his mentor's death, the recruit turned down a move so he could stay on the beat and serve the people of Belfast, just as Gerry had done for so many years.

21 May, 2024, 11:25 PM IST

Who was Bernard Hill? What record did he make by appearing in 'Titanic' and 'The Return of the King'? know in detail

British actor Bernard Hill made his acting debut with the 1982 BBC TV drama 'Boys from the Blackstuff'. He played Yosser Hughes, a character who failed to cope with unemployment in Liverpool.

06 May, 2024, 09:07 PM IST

Bernard Hill death: Iconic actor of 'Titanic' and 'Lord of the Rings' passes away at 79

Actor Bernard Hill, famous for his roles in "Titanic" and "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy, has passed away at the age of 79. He was known for his memorable performances as Captain Edward Smith in "Titanic" and as Theoden, King of Rohan, in "The Lord of the Rings". Hill's career spanned iconic roles in film and television, including his acclaimed portrayal of Yosser Hughes in "Boys From the Blackstuff".

06 May, 2024, 03:05 PM IST

Tommy Shelby returns! Cillian Murphy to reprise iconic 'Peaky Blinders' role

"Peaky Blinders" also features Paul Anderson as Arthur Shelby, Sophie Rundle as Ada Shelby, and Joe Cole as John Shelby, the gang's senior members.

23 Mar, 2024, 08:43 PM IST

‘King & Conqueror’ Series: Check out what we know about cast, plot, episode count, production team and filming

"King and Conqueror" is a historical drama series that follows the story of Harold of Wessex and William of Normandy, leading up to their fateful meeting at the Battle of Hastings in 1066. The series explores the personal struggles and political ambitions of these two men, whose actions shaped the future of England and Europe for centuries to come.

06 Mar, 2024, 01:19 AM IST

The Iron Claw Blu-ray: Check out the release date for the A24 drama

The Iron Claw Blu-ray release date has been announced officially by Lionsgate, further confirming that the A24 drama will be released physically in the next month. Angus Lamont from House Productions, Tessa Ross, Durkin, Juliette Howell, and A24 have produced the movie.

14 Feb, 2024, 11:15 PM IST

Ian Lavender dies at 77 years

Ian Lavender, playing Private Pike in the Dad's Army, has died at the age of 77 years. Lavender was 22 years old when he was cast in the BBC sitcom and soon became a household name. Lavender grew up in the Midlands but has studied acting at the Bristol Old Vic Theatre School.

06 Feb, 2024, 01:13 AM IST

Shetland Season 9: The mystery continues - Release, cast, plot, and all we know so far

The highly praised BBC One crime drama, Shetland, known for its intricate narratives and compelling characters, is currently in a state of uncertainty regarding its future. Despite its acclaim, the show is awaiting confirmation for its ninth season.

07 Jan, 2024, 02:56 PM IST

Curious why 'Fool Me Once' won't return for Season 2? Yet, encouraging news awaits. Find out more

As 'Fool Me Once' exits the stage, the entertainment spotlight shifts, promising more excitement for enthusiasts with an array of upcoming adaptations and British dramas in the entertainment pipeline.

04 Jan, 2024, 06:12 PM IST

BBC's The Tourist Returns: Swaps continents, unveils intriguing characters for second season

Following its UK success in 2022, BBC's The Tourist relocates to Ireland for its second season. Jamie Dornan, reprising his role as Elliot Stanley, navigates severe memory loss in this thriller. Dornan's push for the series' filming closer to home, his honorary doctorate acceptance plans, and favorite 2023 films and shows are highlights. The show, a blend of genres according to Danielle MacDonald, begins airing its new season on January 1 at 9 pm on BBC One, also available for streaming on BBC iPlayer from the same date.

01 Jan, 2024, 06:36 PM IST

How a ‘Fifty Shades Of Grey’ fan gave Jamie Dornan 'scary stalker' experience

Jamie Dornan shares a chilling encounter with a Fifty Shades fan-turned-stalker at his doorstep, creating a backdrop for his constant efforts to shield his family from intrusive fandom. Amidst conspiracy theories and intense role preparations, the actor reflects on unsettling experiences, offering glimpses into his complex journey from model to Hollywood star.

30 Dec, 2023, 06:57 PM IST

Ian Pepperell, known for playing Roy Tucker in The Archers, dies at 53

Renowned for his 22-year portrayal of Roy Tucker in The Archers, actor Ian Pepperell, born in 1970, passed away at 53 after a prolonged illness, leaving behind a legacy of versatile performances and a pub in Ringwood.

23 Dec, 2023, 10:00 PM IST

Is Johnny Carter returning to EastEnders with a new face? Here's what we know

Actor Charlie Suff takes on the role of Johnny Carter in EastEnders, returning to Albert Square after a five-year absence. The character's reappearance coincides with a festive murder mystery storyline.

05 Dec, 2023, 09:15 PM IST

‘The Traitors’: BBC's Hit Show Returns with a Thrilling Twist

BBC's The Traitors is set to make a comeback for a second season in 2024. Claudia Winkleman, renowned for her role as the host of BBC's chart-topping show Strictly Come Dancing, is set to reclaim her position as the anchor of the second season of the main show.

02 Dec, 2023, 10:55 PM IST

The Woman in the Wall: Cast, trailer, US release date and everything else we need to know

The Woman in the Wall is a psychological drama set to explore the murkiest time in Ireland's history, the barbaric Magdalene Laundries. The story revolves around Lorna Brady who has forgotten parts of her life because of sleepwalking. One day, she discovers a dead body and then becomes a suspect in the murder.

22 Nov, 2023, 07:05 PM IST

'Doctors' Final episode: When and where to watch Bafta awards winning show finale

'Doctors' on BBC will stop airing after more than two decades. The final episode will air in December.

18 Oct, 2023, 10:38 PM IST

​BBC's long-running daytime medical drama 'Doctors' to conclude after 23-year run

The BBC has announced that the long-running medical drama 'Doctors' will end in December 2024 due to financial pressures and the need to allocate resources to new projects in the West Midlands. The show, which has received critical acclaim and launched the careers of several actors, will be missed by those associated with it. However, the BBC remains committed to sustaining TV production in the region and plans to redirect resources into developing innovative programming and cultivating scripted programming skills.

18 Oct, 2023, 09:48 PM IST

The Reckoning: BBC unveils first look of Steve Coogan as Jimmy Savile

The first look of Steve Coogan as Jimmy Savile has been unveiled. It will be a four-part drama which is titled as "The Reckoning".

18 Aug, 2023, 12:51 AM IST

BBC's 'Happy Valley' series’ actors starred together in a 1980s film. See what was it

Siobhan Finneran and George Costigan were first casted together 36 years ago, long before BBC primetime hit, Happy Valley was released.

22 Jan, 2023, 11:56 PM IST

Top 10 dramas of 2022 unveiled with BBC at top of list

BBC had a massive year, with seven of its dramas featuring in the top ten most-viewed shows of 2022. The Tourist, which debuted on New Year’s Day, was the most-watched show, followed by ITV's Trigger Point and The Thief, His Wife and The Canoe.

21 Dec, 2022, 07:45 PM IST
